forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 61F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely in the morning. Then the chance of scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low near 50F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
